metadata.title: IRSA takes all decision in accordance with Water Accord 1991: Spokesperson

content.article_body: ISLAMABAD, Apr 16 (APP):Indus River System Authority (IRSA) on Wednesday clarified that as per law, the authority is taking all decisions in accordance with Water Apportionment Accord 1991 and IRSA Act XXII 1992. The authority expressed concern over a news report that appeared in a section of the press, in which IRSA was accused of making biased decisions, said a clarification issued by the spokesperson."
